name: part_006
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz and Todoroki Hajime perform the song 'Gingiragin'.
MC section where Bae and Hajime catch their breath and discuss their performance and choreography.

subtitles.original: 我が身を投じる場所なら絶文
subtitles.english: If it's a place to throw my life away, it's a masterpiece

subtitles.original: 今この場所この舞台で決定
subtitles.english: Decided right here, on this stage

subtitles.original: 五右衛門みたいに かなかな絶景
subtitles.english: Like Goemon, quite a view

subtitles.original: 向かい風 吹いたって
subtitles.english: Even if a headwind blows

subtitles.original: 逆に乗りこなしてやるぜ 俺にとっちゃこれが常で
subtitles.english: I'll tame it instead; for me, this is normal

subtitles.original: 言葉出せぬくらい 暗い時代なんて言うけど
subtitles.english: They say it's a dark era where words can't be spoken

subtitles.original: だけど見せてやる ぶちかましてやる
subtitles.english: But I'll show you, I'll blow you away

subtitles.original: 俺は人生 必死で死ぬまで 死ねんガチな勢いや実践
subtitles.english: In this life, I'm desperate until the end; I can't die with this momentum

subtitles.original: その目開け バカでけぇことやろうぜ
subtitles.english: Open your eyes, let's do something huge

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this

subtitles.original: どんな前も酸いも 全部かっ攫って見せるぜ
subtitles.english: I'll snatch up all the highs and lows

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this

subtitles.original: どんな不安や不満や吸い込みに 目食らっても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm blinded by anxiety, dissatisfaction, or intake

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this

subtitles.original: どうせならばやれることは 全部やっていこうぜ
subtitles.english: If we're doing it anyway, let's do everything we can

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this

subtitles.original: いつか何もかも 終わってしまったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if one day everything comes to an end

subtitles.original: 野暮な戯言にゃ 目もくれず
subtitles.english: Without paying heed to unrefined nonsense

subtitles.original: 俺はこの人生も
subtitles.english: I'll make this life, too

subtitles.original: ギンギラギンに輝かせてくだけだ
subtitles.english: Shine dazzlingly

subtitles.original: ギンギラギンに ありのままに
subtitles.english: Dazzlingly, just as you are

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 終わったー！
subtitles.english: It's over!

subtitles.original: 終わったー！
subtitles.english: It's over!

subtitles.original: ということで、二人目のゲスト！
subtitles.english: So, our second guest!

subtitles.original: 自己紹介お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please introduce yourself!

subtitles.original: はい、ぽぽぽ！ホロライブReGLOSS、轟はじめです！番長！よろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Hi po po po! Hololive ReGLOSS, Todoroki Hajime-desu! Ban-cho! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: 今日、今日もなんだこれ、うむうむ？
subtitles.english: Today, today too, what is this, umu umu?

subtitles.original: うむうむ、うむうむ。
subtitles.english: Umu umu, umu umu.

subtitles.original: やめて、そのノリ。もう。
subtitles.english: Stop that. Seriously.

subtitles.original: こっからもうこれやる、うむうむ。はい、ぽぽぽ。
subtitles.english: From here on we're doing this, umu umu. Hi po po po.

subtitles.original: いやー、はじめこと番長！めちゃありがとね、来てくれて。
subtitles.english: Man, Hajime, aka Ban-cho! Thanks so much for coming.

subtitles.original: できたよ！ できたね！
subtitles.english: We did it! We did it, right!

subtitles.original: できたよ！ できたよね！
subtitles.english: We did it! We really did it!

subtitles.original: ギンギラ、感想はどうですか？
subtitles.english: How was 'Gingira'?

subtitles.original: いや、難しかったー！
subtitles.english: Man, it was hard!

subtitles.original: あの、まだ見てない方はね、昼にね、一応、ギリギリのダンス練習やってて。
subtitles.english: For those who haven't seen it, we had a last-minute dance rehearsal this afternoon.

subtitles.original: うん。そこで振り作ってたんですよ。
subtitles.english: Yeah. We were making the choreography then.

subtitles.original: だからもうさっきの、多分、間違えたところもあったと思うので。
subtitles.english: So just now, there were probably some mistakes.

subtitles.original: そこ、ごめんなさい。すいませんでした、本当に。
subtitles.english: I'm sorry about that. I'm really sorry.

subtitles.original: まぁ、頑張りましたよね。
subtitles.english: Well, we worked hard, didn't we?

subtitles.original: はい！でも30分はないよ、普通。
subtitles.english: Yes! But 30 minutes isn't enough, normally.

subtitles.original: いや、本当に短すぎた。
subtitles.english: No, it really was too short.

subtitles.original: ね！でも楽しかった。
subtitles.english: Right! But it was fun.

subtitles.original: ね！よかった。
subtitles.english: Yeah! I'm glad.

subtitles.original: え、あのね、あそこの振り好きなの。
subtitles.english: You know, I like that part of the choreography.

subtitles.original: なーにゅなーにゅなーにゅなーにゅなーにゅ。
subtitles.english: Nanyunanyunanyunanyunanyu.

subtitles.original: わかる！
subtitles.english: I know!

subtitles.original: これがね！
subtitles.english: This part!

subtitles.original: わかる、わかる。めっちゃわかる。
subtitles.english: I know, I know. I totally get it.

subtitles.original: 爆速だったけど。
subtitles.english: It was crazy fast, though.

subtitles.original: うん、爆速だったのこれでしょう。
subtitles.english: Yeah, this was the crazy fast part.

subtitles.original: うん、それも速い。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's fast too.

subtitles.original: ぅ、ぅ、ぅ、ぅ！これね、めっちゃ速かったね。
subtitles.english: Ugh, ugh, ugh, ugh! This was really fast.

subtitles.original: でも成功したよね！
subtitles.english: But we nailed it!

subtitles.original: 成功した！本当に嬉しい。
subtitles.english: We did! I'm so happy.

subtitles.original: いや、これもね、あの、みんなから、なんか番長とハコ太郎一緒に踊りたい、踊りたいって。
subtitles.english: Well, also, everyone was saying they wanted to see Ban-cho and Hakotaro dance together.

subtitles.original: めっちゃコメントもらったんで、これで満足してるかな？
subtitles.english: I got so many comments like that, so I hope you're satisfied with this?

subtitles.original: 満足、満足してますか？大好きかな？
subtitles.english: Are you satisfied? Do you love it?

subtitles.original: 滑舌取れてつつ分かんない。
subtitles.english: I don't know if my articulation was okay.

subtitles.original: だからまぁ、これからもね、本当に一緒に踊りたいなって。
subtitles.english: So, well, I'd really like to dance together again from now on.

subtitles.original: ね、いつかまた踊ろうね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's dance again sometime.

subtitles.original: ね。可愛いし。
subtitles.english: Right. And you're cute.

subtitles.original: ハコちゃん可愛いじゃない。
subtitles.english: Bae-chan, you're cute too.

subtitles.original: 可愛い。何よ。
subtitles.english: Cute. What?

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 何を？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: 何よって言ったら、何よって言ったの。
subtitles.english: I said 'What?' and you said 'What?'.

subtitles.original: あ、何よか！
subtitles.english: Ah, 'What?'!

subtitles.original: 「何を？」って聞こえた。「何よ？」え？
subtitles.english: I thought I heard 'Nani o?'. 'Nani yo?' Eh?

subtitles.original: 聞き間違え！
subtitles.english: Misheard it!

subtitles.original: ごめん。疲れてるから！
subtitles.english: Sorry. I'm tired!

subtitles.original: お疲れ様だよ、もう。
subtitles.english: You're tired, already.

subtitles.original: うわー。でも、多分、これ僕も初めてなんですよ。
subtitles.english: Whoa. But, probably, this is a first for me too.

subtitles.original: ほりゃ？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: あの、他の人と振りを作ることも初めて。
subtitles.english: Making choreography with someone else is a first too.

subtitles.original: 初めて。え、作ったことある？
subtitles.english: A first. Eh, have you done it before?

subtitles.original: ホロライブ入ってからない。
subtitles.english: Not since joining Hololive.

subtitles.original: おお。僕は人生初めて。
subtitles.english: Oh. For me, it's a first in my life.

subtitles.original: えー！嬉しい。
subtitles.english: Eh! I'm happy.

subtitles.original: 他の人と作ったことない。なんか恥ずかしすぎて作れなかった、元々。
subtitles.english: I've never made it with anyone else. I was originally too embarrassed to.

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしい？
subtitles.english: Embarrassed?

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしい。なんか自分の、そう、自分のアイデアちょっと出しすぎかなって。
subtitles.english: Embarrassed. Like, 'Is it too much to put my own ideas out?'

subtitles.original: 「いや、無理や、これどうかな？」みたいな。今まで無理やった。
subtitles.english: Like 'No, that's impossible, what about this?'. It was impossible until now.

subtitles.original: そう、そう。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: え、でもめっちゃかっこよかったよ。
subtitles.english: But it was really cool.

subtitles.original: ありがとね。ハコちゃんもめっちゃかっこよかったよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you. You were really cool too, Bae-chan.

subtitles.original: And for the overseas people, I hope...
subtitles.english: And for the overseas people, I hope...

subtitles.original: ...we've gotten a lot of your messages about wanting to see us perform together...
subtitles.english: ...we've gotten a lot of your messages about wanting to see us perform together...

subtitles.original: ...so I hope this matched, I don't know, lived up to your expectations.
subtitles.english: ...so I hope this matched, I don't know, lived up to your expectations.

subtitles.original: Um, and if you haven't checked it out, we did do a last-minute dance rehearsal...
subtitles.english: Um, and if you haven't checked it out, we did do a last-minute dance rehearsal...

subtitles.original: ...making the chorus of the choreography you just saw...
subtitles.english: ...making the chorus of the choreography you just saw...

subtitles.original: ...which is why we may have made a few mistakes because it was so last minute, but!
subtitles.english: ...which is why we may have made a few mistakes because it was so last minute, but!

subtitles.original: まぁ、そこはね。
subtitles.english: Well, you know how it is.
